required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating the Effect of a Mobile Audio Companion (Elly) to Reduce Anxiety in Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: IIT2020-13-GRESHAM-ELLY: Evaluating the Effect of a Mobile Audio Companion (Elly) to Reduce Anxiety in Cancer Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-arm, prospective, interventional study in cancer survivors and patients to examine the feasibility of a mobile health application, Elly (Elly Health Inc.), to reduce levels of anxiety, stress, loneliness, and social isolation. Participants will be given access to the Elly phone application developed by Elly Health Inc. and will be asked to complete questionnaires measuring quality of life at multiple timepoints during the study.

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute change in patient-reported anxiety scores at Day 30 compared with baseline.
primary_outcome.description: Absolute change in patient-reported anxiety scores as measures using the NIH (National Institutes of Health) PROMIS (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System) questionnaire at Day 30 compared with baseline. The minimum value is 6 and maximum value is 30, and a lower score means a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute change in patient-reported anxiety scores at Day 14 compared with baseline.
secondary_outcome.description: Absolute change in patient-reported anxiety scores as measures using the NIH (National Institutes of Health) PROMIS (Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System) questionnaire at Day 14 compared with baseline. The minimum value is 6 and maximum value is 30, and a lower score means a better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of Elly app use
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of study participant opening the Elly app

secondary_outcome.measure: Elly app login amount
secondary_outcome.description: Number of logins to Elly app by study participant

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Elly app use
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of each Elly app session by study participant

secondary_outcome.measure: Participant's experience with Elly app at Day 14-30.
secondary_outcome.description: Participant's experience with Elly app based on qualitative interview done between Day 14-30.

secondary_outcome.measure: Participant's experience with Elly app at Day 180-360.
secondary_outcome.description: Participant's experience with Elly app based on qualitative interview done between Day 180-360.

intervention.description: The Elly mobile phone application delivers daily audio recording aimed at reducing anxiety, stress, loneliness, and social isolation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of cancer of any type and currently receiving cancer-targeted treatment or have received cancer-targeted treatment within 6 months of consent date based on self-report. Cancer-targeted treatment includes chemotherapy, radiation therapy, hormonal therapy, biologic therapy, immunotherapy, and surgery.
- 18 years or older
- Access to and ability to use an iPhone (SE+, iOS 12.4+)
- Ability to understand and read English
- Have an understanding, ability, and willingness to fully comply with study procedures and restrictions
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hearing loss or vision impairment that would preclude the participant from accessing and using the app (use of hearing aids or visual aids is acceptable) based on self-report.
